unit.utterance: Yek āqāyi bud bāqdār bud zāheran
unit.utterance_translation: There was a man, he seemed to be a gardner

unit.utterance: ke be ān zahmat mivehā rā čid
unit.utterance_translation: he was picking them with so much trouble

unit.utterance: va radifaš kard barāye xodaš dobāre raft ke bečinad
unit.utterance_translation: he put them in the basket and climbed up the tree again

unit.utterance: yek pesari āmad in mivehā rā dozdid
unit.utterance_translation: a boy came and stole the fruits

unit.utterance: bedune ejāzeaš bardāšt va yek sabadaš rā bord
unit.utterance_translation: without his permission he took a basket and carried away

unit.utterance: bad pesarbače tuye rāh ke dāšt miraft havāsaš part šod be yek doxtarbačeyi ke hālā hamsenno sale xodaš ham bud
unit.utterance_translation: On his way, he got distracted by a little girl, the same age

unit.utterance: bā dočarxe mixorad ba sang tasādof mikonad mixorad zamin mivehā ham mirizad
unit.utterance_translation: his bike hit a stone and he fell down and the fruits spilled out

unit.utterance: mivehā ke rixt yek čandtāyi bačeye digar ke ānjā istāde budand
unit.utterance_translation: as the fruits were all over the ground, some other boys who were standing there

unit.utterance: hālā ehtemālan ānhā nemidānestand ke in dozdid mivehā rā
unit.utterance_translation: probabely they didn't know that the boy had stolen the fruits

unit.utterance: bad āmadand beheš komak kardand ke mivehāyaš rā jam kardand
unit.utterance_translation: they came to help him gather up the fruits

unit.utterance: bad in ke boland šod beravad kolāhaš rā nagerefte bud kolāhaš ruye zamin oftāde bud yeki az ān bačehā kolāhaš rā dobāre bardāšt be=heš dād
unit.utterance_translation: when he got up to go, he forgot his hat. The hat was on the ground, one of the boys took the hat and gave it back to him

unit.utterance: vaqti kolāhaš rā dād yek do se tā miveh ham hālā motevajeh našodam u beheš dād yā xodaš bardāšt
unit.utterance_translation: in return, I'm not quite sure whether the boy gave him some fruits or they themselves took some

unit.utterance: gereft va āmad nafari yek miveh gereft
unit.utterance_translation: they got the fruits, one for each

unit.utterance: Bad Ān bačehā nafari yek miveh bardāštand va be rāhešān edāme dādand
unit.utterance_translation: they boys picked up a pear each and went away

unit.utterance: ān bāqdār ham az deraxt ke āmad pāyin motevajeh šod ke sabade mivehāyaš yek dāne kam ast nist
unit.utterance_translation: the gardner climbed down the tree and found out that one of the baskets was not there

unit.utterance: ke mivehā rā daste ān bačehā did zāheran motevajeh šod ke hala yeki mive rā dozdide be inhā šak ham kard
unit.utterance_translation: as he saw the fruits in the boys' hands, he thought that maybe they were stolen, so he suspect them of stealing his fruits
